column1: Little Goat Diner////I love love this place. The service is always amazing
column2: the prices are reasonable for the area
column3: and the food is just perfect.  Ive been there about three times and have not been disappointed. Yesterday I got the Pork Cemitas
column4: the shrimp and pork belly entree
column5: and the breadsticks. Oh so delicious
column6: all of it! It's hard not to eat everything at once.  It's basically upscale comfort food done right.
